metadata.dc:author: Molina, F
Dargallo, G
Ramos, M
Redondo, E
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of primary neuroendocrine carcinoma (Merkel cell carcinoma) of the external ear and its treatment. This paper also deals with histogenesis, pathology, clinical findings, diagnosis and treatment of this tumor.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma neuroendocrino primitivo de pabell√≥n auricular.
[Primary neuroendocrine carcinoma of the pavilion of the ear].
